description.title: about
description.body: All backpacks are handmade using: YKK brand zippers, interior laptop sleeve, two side pockets, cargo straps, dual front 3D pocket and assortment of other small interior pockets. Please ask for current availability of colors. Your choice of materials be it 10 oz. canvas, 1000D corudura, or waxed canvas are options depending on availability. Bags seen on this site are considered in stock.

description.title: ordering
description.body:
Cost of shipment is included in your order. Tracking number will be provided once shipment has been placed, USPS, continental US orders 3-5 business days.

For custom work and wholesale please inquire here: bermudasf@gmail.com

bag.title: Rucksack
bag.description:
S: 6 x 11 x 21
M: 7 x 12 x 23
L: 8 x 13 x 24.5

Durable bag for all situations/personalities. Comes with laptop sleeve, xtra straps, zippered flap pocket, two 3D pockets and chest strap. Large bag comes with waist strap.

bag.title: Rolltop
bag.description:
S: 6 x 11 x 30
M: 7 x 12 x 31
L: 8 x 13 x 32.5

Stuff more stuff with the extra long unrolling feature. Comes with laptop sleeve, xtra straps, zippered flap pocket, two 3D pockets and chest strap. Large bag comes with waist strap.

bag.title: Duffel
bag.description:
10 x 10 x 23

The thing you put in your hand when you have a backpack on already. Two outer pockets and two inner pockets.

bag.title: Film Bag / Dopp kit
bag.description:
4 x 4 x 9

Holds your getaway/traveling/transient goods, Americana-trailer printed lining.
